attributes.action: Don't Ban petrol and diesel cars, it won't save the planet.
attributes.additional_details:
• Banning petrol and diesel vehicles worldwide would deliver only 0.4% emissions savings at a vast cost to the taxpayer.
• Climate change doesn’t care about where CO2 comes from. Personal cars are only about 7 per cent of global emissions, and electric cars will only help a little.
• The hybrid car saves about the same amount of CO2 as an electric car over its lifetime.
https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2020/11/17/dont-expect-electric-cars-save-planet/
attributes.background: Review the true facts and stop this false Green campaign against cars
